warns: Warning! If you are using Journey Map, you have to change it's file URL to https://media.forgecdn.net/files/2498/313/%5bsolder%5djourneymap-1.12.2-5.5.2.zip and it's MD5 to FD05AC891D40DB9AF9B9057F38BF9667 in the database (for Minecraft 1.12.2). If you need more information, check http://journeymap.info/Technic or contact a human.
ltcl:
- Improved security
- Added accounts system
- Added per-user permissions system- Added account images
- The application can now be installed in a subdirectory
- Added Solder verifier to the dashboard
You have to reconfigure the application before using!
